archived.description: Completed tasks archived. Full details preserved for reference. Updated 2026-01-04 with latest GitHub commits.

tasks.title: Set up Next.js project with Supabase integration
tasks.summary: Initialized Next.js with V0, configured Supabase client, auth context, and Vercel deployment

tasks.title: Implement email/password authentication system
tasks.summary: Created login page, auth flow, protected routes, session persistence. V0 auth bypass for development.

tasks.title: Create database schema and models
tasks.summary: Created Repreneur, Offer, Repreneur_Offer, Note, Activity tables with relationships and RLS. Multiple migrations added over time.

tasks.title: Implement Repreneur List and Detail Views
tasks.summary: List view with sorting/filtering, detail page with inline editing. Fixed Next.js 16 params Promise issue.

tasks.title: Build Kanban Pipeline View
tasks.summary: Static pipeline view (converted from drag-drop Kanban to action-driven status). Added filters and show more.

tasks.title: Implement Notes System
tasks.summary: Notes component with add/delete, chronological display, author tracking. Optimistic updates with useOptimistic hook.

tasks.title: Develop Offer Management System
tasks.summary: Offer CRUD, association with repreneurs, status tracking, expiration calculation.

tasks.title: Create Dashboard with Statistics
tasks.summary: Initial dashboard with repreneur counts by status, navigation links. Later redesigned with Wave 1.0.

tasks.title: Create New Repreneur Form and Add/Edit Functionality
tasks.summary: Form with validation, create/edit modes, success notifications. Enhanced with dropdowns and multi-select.

tasks.title: Implement Tier 1 and Tier 2 scoring systems
tasks.summary: Tier 1 automated scoring from questionnaire, Tier 2 star rating, action-driven status transitions.

tasks.title: Redesign Repreneur list and pipeline views
tasks.summary: Status grouping, dynamic columns, static pipeline, rejected functionality.

tasks.title: Develop Activity tracking and Notes system
tasks.summary: Activity types, forms, chronological display. Notes system complete. Dashboard feed added in Wave 1.0.

tasks.title: Pre-populate the 3 consulting offer packages
tasks.summary: Starter Pack, Deal Flow, Sparring Partner seeded. Auto Client status on offer assignment.

tasks.title: Set up Supabase Storage Bucket for Avatar Uploads
tasks.summary: RepreneurAvatar component with 24 default avatars, custom upload, size variants. Integrated across app.

tasks.title: Add skeleton loading screens for all pages
tasks.summary: 6 loading.tsx files with reusable skeleton UI component. Shimmer animation matching actual layouts.

tasks.title: Implement smooth page transition animations
tasks.summary: Framer Motion page transition wrapper. Fade/slide animations via template.tsx.

tasks.title: Add toast notifications and micro-interactions
tasks.summary: Sonner toast library integrated. Success/error toasts for all CRUD operations.

tasks.title: Implement optimistic UI updates for inline editing
tasks.summary: useOptimistic hook for instant UI updates. Automatic rollback on errors. Fixed race conditions.

tasks.title: Add data prefetching on hover for faster navigation
tasks.summary: router.prefetch() on hover for repreneur cards in list and kanban views.

tasks.title: Animate sidebar active indicator
tasks.summary: Framer Motion layoutId for smooth sliding navigation highlight.

tasks.title: Add radar chart for candidate profile visualization
tasks.summary: CandidateRadarChart with 5 dimensions (Experience, Leadership, M&A, Readiness, Financial). Tooltips added.

tasks.title: Wave 1.0 Dashboard Redesign
tasks.summary: 3-column layout, 12+ new widgets, vs-last-week stats, conversion funnel, journey distribution, activity stream. Wave 1.0 branding.

tasks.title: Add LinkedIn URL and GDPR Consent Fields
tasks.summary: LinkedIn URL field + GDPR consent tracking (marketing_consent, timestamp, source). Migration 010 included.

tasks.title: Add Journey Page for Acquisition Readiness Tracking
tasks.summary: Journey page with visual stage progression (explorer → learner → ready → serial_acquirer). JourneyStageBadge component.

tasks.title: Improve Repreneur Form with Dropdowns and Multi-select
tasks.summary: Investment Capacity dropdown, Sector Preferences multi-select, Target Acquisition Size (6 ranges), Target Location (16 French regions).

tasks.title: V1.0 Enhancements: Milestones, Persona, Notes Redesign
tasks.summary: Offer milestones tracking, persona field (4 buyer types), notes with types (call/email/meeting), activity view dialog, radar chart scoring fixes.

tasks.title: Fix Activity Stream and Add Owner Display
tasks.summary: Fixed dashboard activity query, added activity owner display, redesigned ActivityHistory component, relative time display.

tasks.title: Dashboard Streaming & Activity Heatmap
tasks.summary: GitHub-style 12-month activity heatmap, streaming server components with Suspense, 30-second cache revalidation.

tasks.title: Avatar Redesign with Notion Face Style
tasks.summary: Replaced 24 gradient avatars with 16 Notion-style face PNGs, added grey borders.

tasks.title: Consolidate Questionnaire Forms (Intake + Internal)
tasks.summary: Eliminated ~1800 lines duplicate code. Shared question-config, question-inputs, step-renderer components. Intake 1294→454 lines.

tasks.title: Fix Grouped Table Column Alignment
tasks.summary: Fixed column alignment across status groups. Fixed widths: Name 25%, Email 25%, Status-specific 30%, Created 20%.
